title: Downpour: Learning From Life's Storms
description: Are you caught in another of life's storms? Stuck, with no sign of shore and feeling lost, wondering how you got here and if you've been forgotten here in the fury of the storm. Are you tired of fighting the wind and the waves but not getting anywhere? Embark on a 30-day journey of finding God in the dark places and learning the lessons He is trying to teach you through the storm.
author: Cheyenne Hasty
